sentence.Network_cn: 威利·勃兰特1970年访问东德，书写了历史新篇章。

entry.def: If you visit someone, you go to see them and spend time with them.

example.ex: He wanted to visit his brother in Worcester...
example.tran: 他想去看望住在伍斯特的哥哥。

example.ex: He was visited by an old friend from Iraq...
example.tran: 一位来自伊拉克的老朋友来看望他。

entry.def: If you visit a place, you go there for a short time.

example.ex: He'll be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia...
example.tran: 他将要访问4个城市，包括萨迪尼亚的卡利亚里。

example.ex: Caroline visited all the big stores.
example.tran: 卡罗琳光顾了所有的大型商店。

entry.def: If you visit a website, you look at it.

example.ex: For details visit our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
example.tran: 欲知详情，请访问我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk。

entry.tran: 上门咨询（专业人士）;（专业人士）上门服务
entry.def: If you visit a professional person such as a doctor or lawyer, you go and see them in order to get professional advice. If they visit you, they come to see you in order to give you professional advice.

example.ex: If necessary the patient can then visit his doctor for further advice...
example.tran: 如有必要，病人可以上门咨询自己的医生以得到更多的建议。

example.ex: A doctor will visit you in your apartment.
example.tran: 会有医生到您的住所出诊。

entry.def: If something very unpleasant is visited upon you, it happens to you.

example.ex: Violence is visited upon us every day...
example.tran: 暴力事件每天都会降临在我们身上。

example.ex: Death and suffering had been visited on thousands of innocents.
example.tran: 死亡和苦难降临在了数千名无辜的人身上。

sentences.sentence: "visiting with the neighbors filled her afternoons"
